column2: location=University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Michigan

column1: '''Mythcon 35''' was the thirty-fifth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.
* '''Theme:''' Bridges to Other Worlds: Thirty-Five Years of Mythopoeic Scholarship
* '''Guest of Honors:''' Charles Huttar (Charles Williams scholar) and Neil Gaiman (fantasy author)
* '''Chairman:''' Marion Van Loo and Judith Kollmann
